jobTitle: Expression of Interest - Feature Animation, CG Department
description:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 278 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

The Role

Feature Animation at Netflix is committed to creating content that makes a lasting impression on audiences and expands expectations of what is possible in storytelling. We are paving the way for the bold future of animation by building a community of amazing artists and talent. As a part of Netflix, Feature Animation values integrity, excellence, respect, inclusion, and collaboration. This is the new wave of animation — and you can help shape it!

Interested?

Do you want to join the Feature Animation at Netflix team, but don’t see a current role posted within the CG Department that you’d like to apply for? Typical roles within the Department can include, but aren’t limited to: Previs Artist, Animator, CG Generalist, Modeler, Rigger, Matte Painter, VFX Supervisor, and more.

Submit your information and/or portfolio/reel to our database so we can consider you for roles in the future. If there’s a match to an upcoming role, a member of our Talent Team will be in touch with you!
